page.title: 09CHARLTON-HANK.GOVERNMENT
page.content:
THERE ARE 9 ELECTED PARISH COUNCILLORS IN CHARLTON AND 7 IN HANKERTON. THE NUMBER OF COUNCILLORS IS DECIDED BY THE NORTH WILTS.DISTRICT COUNCIL THROUGH THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT BOUNDARY COMMISSION AND IS BASED ON ACREAGE AND POPULATION. CHARLTON PARISH 4766 ACRES;HANKERTON 2203 ACRES. THE NUMBERS OF COUNCILLORS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE 1921
{NORTH WILTS.DISTRICT COUNCIL ____________________________ THERE IS ONE COUNCILLOR FROM THE AREA ON THE DISTRICT COUNCIL.
{WILTSHIRE COUNTY COUNCIL ________________________ THERE IS ONE COUNCILLOR FOR THE AREA ON THE COUNTY COUNCIL.
